title: AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'exchange'. (AttributeError)
body:
Python
Ubuntu 20
latest dev branch
staggered -> mirroring only
2000 opened orders on 11 markets 
 
Happens after some time and from that time, it repeats every 5-10 minutes, bot completely stops placing orders on all pairs, after some error period, it will place few of them and again stucks.. 


2021-03-01 20:49:45 | ERROR | SellLimitOrder \| 1403150843 | Fail to execute fill state termination : 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'exchange'. (AttributeError)
-- | -- | -- | --
2021-03-01 20:49:45 | WARNING | TaskManager | Error in bot main async loop: {'message': 'Task exception was never retrieved', 'exception': AttributeError("'NoneType' object has no attribute 'exchange'"), 'future': <Task finished name='Task-466512' coro=<<coroutine without __name__>()> exception=AttributeError("'NoneType' object has no attribute 'exchange'")>}
2021-03-01 20:40:57 | ERROR | BuyLimitOrder \| 1871513542 | Fail to execute fill state termination : 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'exchange'. (AttributeError)
2021-03-01 20:40:57 | WARNING | TaskManager | Error in bot main async loop: {'message': 'Task exception was never retrieved', 'exception': AttributeError("'NoneType' object has no attribute 'exchange'"), 'future': <Task finished name='Task-399220' coro=<<coroutine without __name__>()> exception=AttributeError("'NoneType' object has no attribute 'exchange'")>}
2021-03-01 20:38:17 | ERROR | BuyLimitOrder \| 1873750112 | Fail to execute fill state termination : 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'exchange'. (AttributeError)
2021-03-01 20:38:17 | WARNING | TaskManager | Error in bot main async loop: {'message': 'Task exception was never retrieved', 'exception': AttributeError("'NoneType' object has no attribute 'exchange'"), 'future': <Task finished name='Task-390321' coro=<<coroutine without __name__>()> exception=AttributeError("'NoneType' object has no attribute 'exchange'")>}
2021-03-01 20:38:09 | ERROR | BuyLimitOrder \| 1871513848 | Fail to execute fill state termination : 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'exchange'. (AttributeError)
